    public class TextLine
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int capacity 
      static int DEFAULT_SIZE
      Creating an int which specifies the default capacity of a TextLine(set to 80).

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment)
        Returns the index position of the first occurrence of the fragment substring in this TextLine.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the index of the string/substring , and -1 if the fragment is not found.

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment,
                   int fromIndex)
            throws TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns the index position of the first occurrence of the fragment substring in this TextLine, starting at the specified index fromIndex.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the string/substring the user is looking for in this TextLine.
        fromIndex - the index where you begin searching for the string fragment.
        Returns:
        the index of the string/substring , and -1 if the fragment is not found.
        Throws:
        TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException - exception if fromIndex is out of bounds of this TextLine

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        obj - is the object of character you would compare the characters in this textLine to.
        Returns:
